allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive global configuration system for Dual-Hub Architecture

Global Config (config/global_config.yaml):
- Pass-1 Hub settings (spokes, radius, demand, supply, hotspot scoring, validation)
- Pass-2 Hub settings (civil constraints, feasibility defaults, verdict weights)
- State-level rules with area codes and rent multipliers
- Database table configuration
- Retell.ai voice AI settings with call scripts
- External API configuration (Census, Google, Firecrawl, etc.)

TypeScript Config Loader (src/config/GlobalConfig.ts):
- Typed interfaces for all configuration sections
- Singleton pattern with getters for each config section
- Convenience functions: getPass1Config, getPass2Config, getBondingAmount, etc.
- Default configuration hardcoded for browser/Workers compatibility

Python Config Loader (imo_creator/config/credentials.py):
- Load from global_config.yaml with fallback defaults
- Hub configuration getters (get_pass1_config, get_pass2_config)
- State rules and bonding amount lookups
- Updated credential loaders for n8n, Composio, Retell, external APIs

Orchestrator Integration:
- Pass1Orchestrator imports GlobalConfig for weights and thresholds
- Pass2Orchestrator imports GlobalConfig for feasibility and verdict settings
